flawed_nl_solution:
He bought 20/2=<<20/2=10>>10 pounds of pork
So he has 20+10=<<20+10=27>>27 pounds of meat
That means he can make 27/1.5=<<27/1.5=18>>18 meals
So he makes 18*20=$<<18*20=360>>360
#### 360

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 27. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
